mapper.update: update vip_orders v,app_users u set allowance=allowance+frozenAmount, frozenAmount=0 where v.userId=u.id and greenhorn=0 and frozenAmount>0 and v.valid=1
mapper.select: select * from vip_orders where userId = #{userId} and allowance > 0 order by level desc, createTime
select sum(allowance) from vip_orders where userId = #{userId} and level > 0
select sum(allowance) from vip_orders where userId = #{userId} and level = 0 and valid = 1
select sum(total-allowance - frozenAmount) from vip_orders where level = 0
select sum(total-allowance - frozenAmount) from vip_orders v left join tree_paths t on v.userId = t.descendant where t.ancestor = #{userId} and t.level > 0 and v.level = 0
